name: 88 Paws Miner
short_description:
Pauses when computer is in use, fires up when computer is idle - 8 minutes delay.

This is project aims to make crypto currency mining easy for the masses with a set-it and forget-it design. Please know this is an early, non-production, proof of concept version. Feel free to try it out. Use Notepad to edit the cfg.json file, so it mines for you. Later versions will make the setup of the miner/worker easier - a lot easier.

Virus Total Report
https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/432401bd38c8674d0a6af9bf7d7ae4aeba8f89b2b286bfb6532bcd3e0415354c/analysis/1394470222/
